Module Utilities
Package utility

Class Text

java.lang.Object
utility.Text
public class Text extends Object
The Text class provides utility methods for manipulating text strings.
Since:
1.0

    • Text

      public Text(String string)
      Constructs a Text object with the given string.
      Parameters:
      string - The input text string.

  • Method Details

    • wrapText

      public Text wrapText(int lineLength, boolean wrapWords)
      Wraps the text to fit within the specified line length.
      Parameters:
      lineLength - The maximum line length.
      wrapWords - If true, words will be wrapped to the next line if they exceed the line length. If false, the text will be broken at the line length boundary regardless of word boundaries.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with wrapped text.

    • withPrefix

      public Text withPrefix(String string)
      Adds a prefix "a" or "an" to the text based on the presence of vowels.
      Parameters:
      string - The prefix string to be added.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object.

    • upperFirst

      public Text upperFirst()
      Capitalizes the first letter of the text and converts the rest to lowercase.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object.

    • withSuffix

      public Text withSuffix(String suffix)
      Appends a suffix to the text.
      Parameters:
      suffix - The suffix string to be added.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object.

      public Text replaceAll(String target, String replacement)
      Replaces all occurrences of a substring with another string.
      Parameters:
      target - The target substring to be replaced.
      replacement - The replacement string.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object.

      Counts the number of words in the text.

    • reverseWords

      public Text reverseWords()
      Reverses the order of words in the text.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with reversed words.

    • isPangram

      public boolean isPangram()
      Checks if the text is a pangram (contains every letter of the alphabet at least once).
      Returns:
      true if the text is a pangram, otherwise false.

    • removeNonAlphaNumeric

      public Text removeNonAlphaNumeric()
      Removes all non-alphanumeric characters from the text.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with non-alphanumeric characters removed.

    • reverse

      public Text reverse()
      Reverses the characters in the text.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with reversed characters.

    • isPalindrome

      public boolean isPalindrome()
      Checks if the text is a palindrome (reads the same forwards and backwards).
      Returns:
      true if the text is a palindrome, otherwise false.

    • stripHtmlTags

      public Text stripHtmlTags()
      Removes HTML tags from the text.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with HTML tags removed.

    • camelCaseToWords

      public Text camelCaseToWords()
      Converts a camelCase or PascalCase string to separate words.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with words separated.

    • countLines

      The modified Text object.

      public Text padToLength(int length)
      Pads the text to the specified length with whitespace if it is shorter.
      Parameters:
      length - The target length to pad the text to.
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with padded text.

      The modified Text object with shuffled characters.

      Returns:
      The modified Text object with concatenated text.

    • base64Encode

      public Text base64Encode()
      Base64 encodes the text using the default character encoding (UTF-8).
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with Base64-encoded text.

    • base64Decode

      public Text base64Decode()
      Base64 decodes the text to its original form using the default character encoding (UTF-8).
      Returns:
      The modified Text object with Base64-decoded text.
